title: Mecha Zero Sion Missing VO?
body: I think I may have posted this in the wrong section before, but, I have noticed that Mecha Zero Sion is missing two quotes. "All aboard the hype train" and "Unstoppable". I am not sure wether these quotes are scrapped or not as I have checked several posts asking this question and all seem to have gone unanswered, and also apparently unfixed either because I have played over 400 games on sion with said skin and not heard these lines. Can a riot member please confirm to me wether they were removed or not? thanks

replies.body: I'm not sure about whether or not those VO's were just removed for that skin or not, but I'd suggest posting this over in Report a Bug to make sure this gets noticed by the right people.

For mecha Sion. his slam's icon is smaller than the actual hitbox itself. I can clearly sidestep it and be out of the visual but still get hit. So either his skin needs to be disabled during ranked or just needs a visual fix. Countless times players admitted to that being the reason they got the skin
